ActExcise Act, 2001
PrecisCONTINUATION OF AMALGAMATED OR MERGED CORPORATIONS REGULATIONS which allow, for duty payment only, a new corporation to be regarded as the same as, and a continuation of, each of its predecessor corporations, and take effect on July 1, 2003.
